item.title: Genomic Tool for Enriched Region Detection
item.description: h1.title { text-align: center; } h4.author { text-align: center; } h4.date { text-align: center; } body{ /* Normal */ font-size: 14px; td { /* Table */ font-size: 14px; } h1.title { font-size: 24px; } h1 { /* Header 1 */ font-size: 24px; } h2 { /* Header 2 */ font-size: 16px; } h3 { /* Header 3 */ font-size: 14px; } code.r{ /* Code block */ font-size: 14px; } pre { /* Code block - determines code spacing between lines */ font-size: 14px; } 1.
